name: The Devil City & its 77 Vicious Princes
name_original: The Devil City & its 77 Vicious Princes
description:
The Devil City and its Seventy Seven Vicious Princes is a roleplaying game of high ambition and court intrigue. Each player controls multiple characters at once to portray a HOUSE OF ZARKANY: A vicious prince and their blood-oathed knights, in a golden city at the very mouth of Hell.

The game is currently in early access.

A suite of tools, including extensive generators, can be found at https://devilcity.carrd.co/
